analytic.title: The Credentials of Mar Julius Alvares, Bishop of Ceylon, Goa and India Excluding Malabar

biblStruct.note: This brief article gives the Syriac text, with English translation, of the certificate of episcopal consecration given to Mar Julius Alvares, a Roman Catholic priest who joined the Syrian Orthodox Church in 1894. The text is compared with the alleged certificate of episcopal consecration given to Joseph René Vilatte, another convert, who was later excommunicated from the said Church.
